original_text: Salt is good, but if the salt has lost its saltiness, how will you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with one another.”
korean_text: 소금은 좋은 것이로되 만일 소금이 그 맛을 잃으면 무엇으로 이를 짜게 하리요 너희 속에 소금을 두고 서로 화목하라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: but if the salt has lost its saltiness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 소금이 그 맛을 잃으면

sentences.original_text: how will you make it salty again?
and be at peace with one another.
